name: In the Mind
description:
"Four Emotions - Fear, Confusion, Sadness, and Anger take over Zack's life one day.

To try and overcome these emotions, Zack images a different world. Only this world isn't quite the same. In order to abandon this world and forget the past Zack must travel through this world. While facing the truth..."

In the Mind will be a Visual Novel/RPG taking place in First Grader Zack's life. Color will represent almost everything. Anger - Red, Orange - Fear, etc. Part 1, Fear, is now available for Alpha testing! (Some aspects from this game are taken from my life as well)
